mapper.select: SELECT J.PRICE, J.ACCOUNT_CODE, J.DEBIT_CREDIT FROM SLIP S RIGHT JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) WHERE TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} - 1 AND COM_CODE = #{comCode}
SELECT J.PRICE, J.ACCOUNT_CODE, J.DEBIT_CREDIT FROM SLIP S RIGHT JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) WHERE TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE, 'YYYY') <= #{year} - 1 AND COM_CODE = #{comCode}

SELECT S.SLIP_DATE, S.SLIP_CODE, S.DATE_SLIP_CODE, J.DEBIT_CREDIT, J.VENDER_CODE, V.VENDER_NAME, J.PRICE, J.ACCOUNT_CODE, A.ACCOUNT_TITLE, S.BRIEF FROM SLIP S LEFT JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT_TITLE A ON(J.ACCOUNT_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_CODE) LEFT JOIN VENDER V ON(J.VENDER_CODE = V.VENDER_CODE) WHERE S.COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{year} || LPAD(#{month}, 2, 0) || LPAD(#{date}, 2, 0) AND S.DATE_SLIP_CODE = #{dateSlipCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MFRG_STMT(MFRG_STMT_CODE, COM_CODE, YEAR, TERM, CLOSING, VAL13, SUM90) VALUES(SEQ_MFRG_STMT_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{comCode}, #{year}, #{term}, #{closing}, #{val13}, #{sum90})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, MFRG_STMT_CODE, VAL13, CLOSING FROM (SELECT MFRG_STMT_CODE, VAL13, CLOSING FROM MFRG_STMT WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} ORDER BY MFRG_STMT_CODE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT SUM90 FROM MFRG_STMT WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} AND MFRG_STMT_CODE = (SELECT MAX(MFRG_STMT_CODE) FROM MFRG_STMT WHERE CLOSING = 'Y' AND YEAR = #{year})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INCOME_STMT(INCOME_STMT_CODE, COM_CODE, YEAR, TERM, CLOSING, SUM10, V40100, SUM20, VAL213, VAL223, SUM30, SUM40, SUM50, SUM100) VALUES(SEQ_INCOME_STMT_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{comCode}, #{year}, #{term}, #{closing}, #{sum10}, #{v40100}, #{sum20}, #{val213}, #{val223}, #{sum30}, #{sum40}, #{sum50}, #{sum100})

INSERT INTO INCOME_STMT(INCOME_STMT_CODE, COM_CODE, YEAR, TERM, CLOSING, SUM10, SUM20, VAL213, VAL223, SUM30, SUM40, SUM50, SUM60, SUM70, SUM80, SUM90, SUM100) VALUES(SEQ_INCOME_STMT_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{comCode}, #{year} - 1, #{term}, #{closing}, #{lastSum10}, #{lastSum20}, #{lastVal213}, #{lastVal223}, #{lastSum30}, #{lastSum40}, #{lastSum50}, #{lastSum60}, #{lastSum70}, #{lastSum80}, #{lastSum90}, #{lastSum100})
mapper.update: UPDATE INCOME_STMT SET CLOSING = #{closing}, SUM10 = #{lastSum10}, SUM20 = #{lastSum20}, VAL213 = #{lastVal213}, VAL223 = #{lastVal223}, SUM30 = #{lastSum30}, SUM40 = #{lastSum50}, SUM50 = #{lastSum50}, SUM60 = #{lastSum60}, SUM70 = #{lastSum70}, SUM80 = #{lastSum80}, SUM90 = #{lastSum90}, SUM100 = #{lastSum100} WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} - 1 AND INCOME_STMT_CODE = (SELECT MAX(INCOME_STMT_CODE) FROM INCOME_STMT WHERE YEAR = #{year} - 1)
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, INCOME_STMT_CODE, VAL213, CLOSING FROM (SELECT INCOME_STMT_CODE, VAL213, CLOSING FROM INCOME_STMT WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND YEAR = #{year} ORDER BY INCOME_STMT_CODE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
